name: nativescript-mapbox
description: A Nativescript plugin for Mapbox Native Maps.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.android.build: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns build android --log debug
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-mapbox && cd ../src
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-mapbox && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-mapbox && cd ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-mapbox && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo-angular.reset && npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
